doc.title: Bus Stop
doc.plot: man waits for the bus through wind, rain and snow. He keeps himself occupied and his kafkaesque actions become slapstick par excellence. What do people do to keep themselves occupied while they are waiting? How do you fill the time; what makes waiting so uncomfortable? These questions are the premise for the character, who like Charlie Chaplin, Buster Keaton or Harold Lloyd does not need words to be funny. A visual gem and an entertaining experience.
